amendment.description: To require an assessment of the feasibility of expanding the agricultural quarantine and inspection program to products entering Hawaii.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3110 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3110 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3110 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Hirono to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3110 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
